attributes.title: Epilepsy warning
attributes.review: this horrible app has so many flashing lights in it and doesn’t even have an epilepsy warning. My brother who is in love with our president has frequent seizures due to epilepsy. he was unaware that there was going to be flashing lights, as there was no warning. this app needs taken down immediately.

attributes.title: Diarrhea storm
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to see our orange president and see how he runs the country and then 2 minutes after i downloaded the app it glitches out and then i looked outside and i saw a diarrhea storm forming and them seahorses also came so done download this app to keep everyone safe😻🦍👄👈🧚‍♀️💞😔👈🧝‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧝‍♀️😞🤿

attributes.title: No hope and disappointment
attributes.review: This was a disappointment because when I downloaded this app I was looking for more reasons to be for trump but what I actually found was just unhelpful. First he hasn’t built the wall second he has made the world go into much more debt than needed.

attributes.title: Don’t buy this app
attributes.review: I was seeing if I should vote for trump this time but no no no no no dingbat this app just made not vote for him , I wouldn’t dare , he is a racist ( white folks yes he is ) , he is a child predator and a child rapist ( he did this w Jeffery Epstein) then he also said if Ivanka wasn’t his daughter he would date her, that’s nasty and it’s freaking true

attributes.title: Can’t believe this happened
attributes.review: When I download the app it took 30 minutes after the long wait to see why I should vote for Donald trump I opened the app and my phone got Corrupted by malware and my phone exploded in my face. Then I heard that trump is planing to take down TikTok and I was furious. Thank you for your time

I got this app but I didn’t know that a scary orange gremlin was gonna be on it! My mom passed out and fell on my dog who is now squished. My dog was the sheep hearder and then I had to heard the sheep by myself. After that I fell and broke my leg and now I’m stuck on the field with nothing but my phone. If I could rate this app zero I would!!🌷🧚‍♂️TRUMP 🍊2020 but on a gravestone🌷🧚‍♂️🍄

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: i downloaded this app w the same expectations i had when voting for trump as president. however not only did this app and president trump not fulfill these expectations but they have managed to go so far below these expectations. this app is poorly organized has a stupid layout, and is very unwelcoming for the majority of Americans
